meanings.definition: To gather or draw up (fabric) into parallel rows with a running stitch in order to decorate or create fullness.
meanings.sent1: She decided to shirr the curtains to make them look more elegant.
meanings.sent2: The dress was shirred at the waist to give it a flattering shape.
meanings.sent3: The shirred tablecloth added a touch of charm to the dining table.
meanings.sent4: The shirred fabric resembled gentle waves on the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The shirring technique made the pillow cover look luxurious.

meanings.definition: A decorative pattern created by shirring fabric.
meanings.sent1: The shirr on the dress added a unique texture to the design.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite blouse had intricate shirring details on the sleeves.
meanings.sent3: The shirr on the pillow cover made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: The shirr resembled tiny ripples on a calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The shirring pattern on the curtains caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To bake (eggs) in a dish in the oven until set.
meanings.sent1: She would often shirr eggs for a quick and easy breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The chef shirred the eggs with cheese for a delicious brunch dish.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally shirred the eggs for dinner instead of frying them.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the shirred eggs filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: Shirring eggs is a simple way to prepare a nutritious meal.
